Description: Primary key identifier for the achievement

Data Quality Checks: NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to data_collect.snapshot

Description: Reference to the stoplight indicator that was achieved
Data Quality Checks: NOT NULL, Positive integer, FK validation to library.stoplight_indicator

Description: Unix timestamp when the achievement was recorded

Data Quality Checks: Valid Unix timestamp, Not in future

Description: Description of how the achievement was accomplished
Sample Values: The family enrolled in job training program and secured stable employment

Data Quality Checks: Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.organizations
Positive integer, FK validation to ps_network.applications

Description: URL to related media (photo/video) for this achievement
User who last modified the record
Timestamp when the record was created

Data Quality Checks: Valid timestamp, Not in future, >= created_date
